explanation: [0-0] On a city street sidewalk, a man in a black T-shirt faces the camera with a disposable glove on his left hand and slightly raises a fruit knife in his right hand. In front of him is a metal cart filled with fresh fruits such as apples, dragon fruits, and pears, with a metal container placed on the cart. A white car drives by on the road behind him.
[0-4] The man in the black T-shirt quickly cuts the apple in his hand into small pieces with a fruit knife, which fall into the metal container below.
